languages.text: The character's INT and WP are decreased in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.

traits.locale_text: The character's INT and WP are decreased in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.

languages.text: Reduces the character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воля{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g} персонажа в следующем бою будут уменьшены. Это однократный штраф, который исчезнет по завершении боя.

traits.locale_text: The character's Intelligence and Willpower will be reduced in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.
Reduces the character's Intelligence and Willpower in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.
Reduces the character's Intelligence and Willpower in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.

languages.text: Bir sonraki çatışmada karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliklerini azaltır. Bu ceza puanı tek seferliktir ve çatışma bitince ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text: Reduces the character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.

traits.locale_text: Bir sonraki çatışmada karakterin Zekâ ve İrade niteliklerini azaltır. Bu ceza puanı tek seferliktir ve çatışma bitince ortadan kalkar.

languages.text: Reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} del personaje en el siguiente combate. Esta es una penalización única que desaparece al terminar el combate.
languages.original_text: Reduces the character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.

traits.locale_text: Reduce la Inteligencia y la Voluntad del personaje en el siguiente combate. Esta es una penalización única que desaparece al terminar el combate.

languages.text: 在下一场战斗中，此角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}降低。此减值效果为一次性效果，会在战斗结束之后消失。
languages.original_text: Reduces the character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.

traits.locale_text: 在下一场战斗中，此角色的智力与意志降低。此减值效果为一次性效果，会在战斗结束之后消失。

languages.text: Réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} du personnage lors du prochain combat. Cette pénalité unique disparaît à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Reduces the character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.

traits.locale_text: Réduit l'Intelligence et la Force mentale du personnage lors du prochain combat. Cette pénalité unique disparaît à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 次の戦闘でキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が低下する。これは1回限定ペナルティで、戦闘終了後に消える。
languages.original_text: Reduces the character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.

traits.locale_text: 次の戦闘でキャラクターの知性と意志力が低下する。これは1回限定ペナルティで、戦闘終了後に消える。

languages.text: Reduziert {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} des Charakters im nächsten Kampf. Dies ist ein einmaliger Abzug, der nach dem Kampf verschwindet.
